content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle in the image highlights a diagonal groove extending in the Y-Z plane. It exhibits a sloped configuration with a 45° downward inclination.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 175, -75],
    [0, -75, 175]
  ]
}
```
